bug.author: sriumcp
bug.summary: Missing input.json file in v1beta1 rollout folder
bug.description: /kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: While following the v1beta1 rollout sample instructions, I noticed that it references an input.json file which is missing from the folder. What did you expect to happen: I expected to find input.json in the docs/samples/v1beta1/rollout folder. Anything else you would like to add: The models used are the same as in v1alpha2 rollout sample, so the same input.json should work. It simply needs to be copied over.
